awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A film-within-a-film: a fading movie producer has a plan for a successful movie: get a actress famous for her wholesome image to appear in the nude on the screen.... much like this film itself.
plot: A movie producer who made a huge flop tries to salvage his career by revamping his film as an erotic production, where its family-friendly star takes her top off.
title: S.O.B.
